entry.title: AbdulmalekAlshugaa/netly-rn-expo: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.
entry.content: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.

entry.title: somritdasgupta/queFork: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.

entry.title: maryam274/Mini-POS-API-System-: The Mini POS ÓÇÅPoint of Sale) API System is a lightweight backend designed for managing users, products, and invoices. It follows RESTful API principles, using Node.js, Express.js, JSON Web Token, Bcryptjs and MongoDB (via Mongoose) for data management.
entry.content: The Mini POS ÓÇÅPoint of Sale) API System is a lightweight backend designed for managing users, products, and invoices. It follows RESTful API principles, using Node.js, Express.js, JSON Web Token, Bcryptjs and MongoDB (via Mongoose) for data management.

entry.content: üé¨ A lightweight, customizable video player with support for adaptive streaming, subtitles, and full control customization.

entry.title: zacheryvaughn/network-volume-manager: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory. Not really intended as a consumer facing application, it's intended as a separate deployment to serverless providers that don't have dedicated file management built-in.
entry.content: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory. Not really intended as a consumer facing application, it's intended as a separate deployment to serverless providers that don't have dedicated file management built-in.

entry.title: MrSIHAB/easykv: A lightweight and flexible library for working with Deno KV. It simplifies database interactions in Deno applications.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible library for working with Deno KV. It simplifies database interactions in Deno applications.

entry.title: jspreadsheet/openetl: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

entry.title: arijitcodes/microstream-client: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection.
entry.content: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection.

entry.title: arijitcodes/microstream-hub: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.
entry.content: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.

entry.title: mmycin/notifier-mycin: Notifier-Mycin is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-use notification toast library built with Toastify-js and designed to work seamlessly with Bun. It allows you to display beautiful, animated notifications (toasts) in your web applications with minimal setup.
entry.content: Notifier-Mycin is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-use notification toast library built with Toastify-js and designed to work seamlessly with Bun. It allows you to display beautiful, animated notifications (toasts) in your web applications with minimal setup.
